content: 1. Developing and management social media campaigns.
2. Develop and monitor strategies for paid search: Google Adwords, Facebook Ads, etc.
3. Prepare and publish daily content plans on platforms such as Instagram, Facebook.  Manage creative content production processes (visuals, videos, and copy).
4.Being able to use content creation tools such as Canva and CapCut at an advanced level.
5. Measure and report performance of all marketing campaigns related to organizational goals.
6. Develop and manage email marketing campaigns and lead nurturing strategies.
7. Actively participating in the orientation process and gaining short-term experience across different departments.
8. Track and analyse social media metrics.

AIESEC is a non-governmental not-for-profit organization in consultative status with the United Nations Economic and Social Council (ECOSOC), affiliated with the UN DPI, member of ICMYO, and is recognized by UNESCO. AIESEC International is registered as a non for profit organization, corporation number 1055154-6 in Montreal, Canada.
